price: (Mose kͻͻ so kaa sε): “Nokorε sε deԑ saa nkorͻfoͻ yi wᴐ mu yi, de wᴐn bԑkᴐ ᴐsԑeԑ mu ama wᴐn dwuma a wᴐredie ayԑ kwa.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ مُتَبَّرٞ مَّا هُمۡ فِيهِ وَبَٰطِلٞ مَّا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna hāulāi mutabbarun mā hum fīhi wabāṭilun mā kānū yaʿmalūna
